trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all field template controls.
ASP.NET Dynamic Data field templates are ASP.NET user controls that map data controls to data types in a data model.
Field templates derive from <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl>, the class that enables access to data fields, data columns, and metadata in data models.
Dynamic Data projects provide field templates by default.
You can modify the field templates provided by default or create custom field templates.
This class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> Class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl"></xref> class.
Gets the URL that links to the page that displays the list of children entities and allows the path to be overridden.
This method is similar to <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl.ChildrenPath%2A>, except that it allows the path part of the URL to be overridden.
This method is used if the pages are not located in the DynamicData\CustomPages folder of the Dynamic Data project.
This method applies to Children columns only.
The path to override.
The URL that links the displayed page to the children page.
Get the URL that links the current page to the page that displays the details of the foreign key entity and allows the path to be overridden.
This method is similar to <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl.ForeignKeyPath%2A> except that it allows the path of the URL to be overridden.
This property is used if the page is not located in the DynamicData\CustomPages folder your the Dynamic Data project.
The path to override.
The URL that links to the page that displays the details of the foreign key page.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn"></xref> object associated with a field template.
This property casts a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn> to a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn>.
If the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn> class is not a children column, this property throws an exception.
A column that represents a one-to-many relationship.
<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl.ChildrenColumn"></xref> is `null`.
Gets the URL that links to a page that displays a list of children entities.
This method returns a URL that links to a page that displays a list of children entities.
For example, the products column in the ProductCategories table in the AdventureWorksLT sample database has URLs that link to the list of product that are in the selected category.
This property only applies to children columns.
The URL that links the displayed page to the children entities.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn"></xref> associated with a field template.
An object that represents a database column.
Gets the type of the data-bound control that contains the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl"></xref> class.
The container control type.

Gets either an input value or `null` based on <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.ConvertEmptyStringToNull"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText"></xref>.

This method returns <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property and <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A> property which can be set via metadata or the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> class or <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl>.
The input value.
The converted value.
Gets the data control that handles the data field in a field template.
A data control that handles the data field in a field template.
Saves the value of foreign keys.
This method is used when saving foreign key columns.
The value of the foreign key is selected from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> property of a drop down list.
The dictionary that contains all the new values.
The value to save.
Provides dictionary access to all data in the current row.
This method implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableControl.ExtractValues%2A> method.
The dictionary that contains all the new values.
Gets or sets the value of a column in a current row.
An object that represents the value of the column in the current row.
Gets the string representation of the value of a column in the current row when the row is in edit mode.
If formatting is enabled the string is formatted after editing.
The value of the column in the row that is edited.
Gets the formatted string representation of the value of a column in the current row.
The formatted value of the column in the current row.
Determines the field template that is used to render a specified data column.
The data column the field template renders.
The field template that is used to render a specified data column.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.MetaForeignKeyColumn"></xref> that is associated with a foreign key column.
This class converts the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn> to a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaForeignKeyColumn>.
The class throws an exception if <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn> is not a foreign key column.
A column that represents a many-to-one relationship.
If the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.MetaForeignKeyColumn"></xref> is not a foreign key column.
Get the URL that links the current page to the page that displays the details of the foreign key entity.
If the data column has a many-to-one relationship, this property returns a URL that links to the page that displays the details of the foreign key entity.
For example, in the Category column of the Product table in the Northwind Database, this method can return a link that goes to the details of the category that the product belongs to.
This property applies to foreign key columns only.
The URL that links to the details of the foreign key data.
Applies HTML encoding and formatting to a string that will be displayed.
The value from the data field to format.
The formatted value.
Gets or sets the HTML encoding and formatting options to apply to a field template.
The interface that exposes the HTML encoding and formatting options to apply to a field template.
Gets the value of a specified column in the current row.
The column to get the value from.
An object that represents the value of a specified column in the current row.
Returns the string representation of the column's value.
The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl.GetSelectedValueString%2A> method is used to return a string representation of foreign-key or enumeration column types.
If the column's current value is a foreign-key column or an enumeration column, a string representation of the selected value; otherwise, `null`.
Gets or sets the host that provides context to this <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl"></xref> class.
The object that provides context to this field template class.
Allows a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator"></xref> to ignore a specific type of model validation attribute.
This method allows a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator> to ignore a specific type of model Validation attributes.
This method is called when the attribute type is already handled by an ASP.NET validation controls.
Without this call, the validation can occur two times, resulting in a duplicate error message.
The attribute to ignore.
Gets the collection of metadata attributes that apply to the current column.
The collection of metadata attributes that apply to the column.
Gets the mode a field template uses.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode> that field templates uses include `Insert`, `Edit`, and `ReadOnly`.
The current mode of the field template.
Populates a list control with all the values from a parent table.
This method works with only foreign key columns.
The list control to populate.
Gets the current data row object.
The object returned by this the property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method are equivalent.
This property uses the `Page.GetDataItem` method to return the data row object.
The current data row object.
Sets up a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplateHost.ValidationGroup"></xref> on all validation controls.

This method performs additional logic for specific validation control such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator> and sets up a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.ValidationGroup%2A> on all validation controls.
The validation control to set up.
Sets up a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator"></xref> using the type of validator and the column to validate.
This method used to set up <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.ValidationGroup%2A> on all validators.
It performs additional logic for specific validator types in this method.
For example, if range values exit in the data model this method sets up <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>.
The type of validator to set up.
The column for which to validator is set.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable"></xref> that a column of a field template belongs to.
The table that the column that is associated with the field template belongs to.
Associates a field template with the object that controls how the field template is used.
This method implements the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate.SetHost%2A> interface.
The object that hosts the field template class.
Controls the use of the field template.
Retrieves a set of name/value pairs to implement two-way data-binding in field template controls.
The dictionary that contains name/values pairs.
